changeSet.createView: SELECT w.name AS workspace, wa.key AS wsp_key, wa.description AS wsp_desc, base_table.id, s.name AS service, r.name AS requester, p.name AS product, dt.name AS deliver_to, df.name AS deliver_from, at.name AS assign_to, sc.name AS status, base_table.quantity, u.name AS quantity_unit, base_table.parent, base_table.notes, up.name AS updated_by, base_table.version, base_table.protocol FROM job base_table JOIN existential s ON base_table.service = s.id JOIN existential p ON base_table.product = p.id JOIN existential at ON base_table.assign_to = at.id JOIN existential r ON base_table.requester = r.id JOIN existential dt ON base_table.deliver_to = dt.id JOIN existential df ON base_table.deliver_from = df.id JOIN existential sc ON base_table.status = sc.id JOIN existential up ON base_table.updated_by = up.id JOIN existential u ON base_table.quantity_unit = u.id LEFT JOIN workspace_authorization wa ON base_table.workspace = wa.id LEFT JOIN existential w ON wa.defining_product = w.id
